replies.body: Accounts get several warnings as attempts to help usher reform before it gets escalated to a permanent ban. These warnings and temporary suspensions are meant to give them a chance to change the behavior that was punished for. We can't simply trade punishments between accounts either. If your friend doesn't remember what happened to warrant the ban, they're always welcome to submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that context.
yeah but that just makes them make other acc and do the same thing instead of fixing their behavior while there are cases that can be solved this way
litteraly can't anything happen about that? iven if i take a punisment for him to?

Your friend should've learned his lesson before the permanent ban. He got a 2 week ban before most likely, and it makes explicitly clear that any further offenses will be permanent. If your friend flamed and the ban was thus proper, it is virtually impossible it be removed. Riot does not reverse permanent bans that were not placed in error.
